name: Bubble Wrap Mania
description:
*pop*, *pop*, *pop* - remember that noise and feeling when you last got a piece of bubblewrap paper in your hands?

Relive that experience without wasting bubblewrap paper!

3D Touch and Taptic Feedback enabled - for extra realistic bubble popping on supported devices

Supports background audio, listen to your music, podcasts or audiobooks while playing, this game will not pause your sound!

Multiple Game modes:

Normal mode - pop bubbles as fast as you can, beware the thumbtacks, create patterns and combos with increasing difficulty
Strategy mode - same as normal mode, but without time limit
Zen mode - no patterns, no time limit, just an endless stream of bubbles

Download now and have fun!
